div.h3: What type of accommodation are you offering?
What type of property is this?

input.title: Do not include the word 'Unit' Note: Your exact address will not be shared with other members.
input.name: property_address

div.h3: Who currently lives in the property

div.p: Listings with images appear higher in search results than those without. You can also add or change images later.
Pets, kids, smoking, start date, length of stay etc.
Help your future flatmate learn about you and your property

div.h3: Tell us about you and your flatmates

div.p: Tell your potential flatmate a little about yourself and the other flatmates living in the home. Describe what you do for work, where you're all from and what you do for fun.

div.h3: What's great about living at this property?

div.p: Include features like Netflix, a pool, air conditioning, great views or anything that will attract room seekers.
